member.name: T:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController
member.summary: Manages Events.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController},Fursvp.Domain.IEventService,Fursvp.Data.IRepository{Fursvp.Domain.Event})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The application event logger.
The instance of used to create and update Events.
The instance of used for Event persistence.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.GetEvents
member.summary: Retrieves details for all Events.
member.returns: A list of objects representing each Event.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.GetEvent(System.Guid)
member.summary: Retrieves details for an Event.
member.param: The globally unique identifier of the Event to update.
member.returns: An object representing the Event matching the id.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.CreateEvent(Fursvp.Api.Requests.NewMemberRequest)
member.summary: Creates a new Event.
member.param: The for the author of the Event.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.UpdateEvent(System.Guid,Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateEventRequest)
member.summary: Updates an Event.
member.param: The globally unique identifier of the Event to update.
The containing new Event details.
member.returns: 200 Ok on success, or 404 Not Found if the Event Id is not found.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.PublishEvent(System.Guid)
member.summary: Updates an Event so that it is publicly visible.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the Event.
member.returns: 200 Ok on success, or 404 Not Found if the Event Id is not found.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.UnpublishEvent(System.Guid)
member.summary: Updates an Event so that it is no longer publicly visible.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the Event.
member.returns: 200 Ok on success, or 404 Not Found if the Event Id is not found.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.AddMember(System.Guid,Fursvp.Api.Requests.NewMemberRequest)
member.summary: Adds a new member to an Event's signups.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the Event.
The containing member data to be added.
member.returns: 201 Created on success, 404 Not Found if the Event Id is not found, or 400 Bad Request if the member's email address already exists in the event.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.UpdateMember(System.Guid,System.Guid,Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateMemberRequest)
member.summary: Updates the member's info for an Event.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the Event.
The globally unique identifier for the Event's Member to be updated.
The containing member data to be updated.
member.returns: 200 Ok on success, 404 Not Found if either the Event Id or Member Id are not found, or 400 Bad Request if the member is not either attending or an organizer.

member.name: M:Fursvp.Api.Controllers.EventController.RemoveMember(System.Guid,System.Guid)
member.summary: Removes a Member from an Event's sign-ups.
member.param: The globally unique identifier for the Event.
The globally unique identifier for the Event's Member to be removed.
member.returns: 204 No Content on success, or 404 Not Found if either the Event Id or Member Id are not found.

member.summary: Gets or sets the locaiton of the Event.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Event Name.

member.summary: Gets or sets miscellaneous information about an Event.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateEventRequest.RsvpOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether RSVPs for an Event are open before RsvpClosesAt.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateEventRequest.RsvpClosesAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time at which RSVPs for the Event are scheduled to close.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateEventRequest.StartsAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time at which the Event is scheduled to start.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateEventRequest.EndsAt
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time at which the Event is scheduled to end.

member.summary: The request object to be serialized from the body of API calls pertaining to inserting or updating Member info.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateMemberRequest.IsAttending
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an event member is attending the event.

member.name: P:Fursvp.Api.Requests.UpdateMemberRequest.IsOrganizer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an event member is an organizer.
